name: Called Shot
description:
Choose one part of the body to target (Conditions are applied on hit after combat for one turn):
 • Arms— Hit -15. [Hexed]
 • Legs— Hit -25. [Halt]
 • Head— Hit -35. Crit +35.
 • Torso— Hit -45. [Exposed]
(Target for as if already affected.)
This combat art can be used with one other combat art with AP = 1 that does not apply a condition on hit.
